wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Frank Mitchell (22 October 1907 – 20 May 1960) was an English cricketer who played for Kent County Cricket Club between 1928 and 1934.

response: * Thomas Mitchell (football manager) (1843–1921), manager of Blackburn Rovers and Woolwich Arsenal football clubs
* Thomas Mitchell (actor, fl. 2010s), actor in Cold Blooded
* Thomas Mitchell (explorer) (1792–1855), Scottish explorer of Australia
* Thomas Mitchell (Medal of Honor) (1857–1942), United States Navy sailor and Medal of Honor recipient
* Thomas Mitchell, editor of the Las Vegas Review-Journal
